dict.string: on alfred_script(account_user) set AppleScript's text item delimiters to {"##"} set user_info to account_user's text items set AppleScript's text item delimiters to {""} set user_account to item 1 of user_info set user_name to item 2 of user_info tell application "Adium" set user to contact user_name of account user_account set is_chat_found to false repeat with chat_opened in every chat of every chat window repeat with chat_contact in chat_opened if user_name = name of chat_contact then set is_chat_found to true exit repeat end if end repeat if is_chat_found then exit repeat end repeat if not is_chat_found then if not (exists (first chat window)) then tell account user_account to (make new chat with contacts {contact user_name} with new chat window) else set existing_window to first chat window set existing_chat to last chat of existing_window tell account user_account to (make new chat with contacts {contact user_name} at after existing_chat) end if end if repeat with chat_opened in every chat of every chat window repeat with chat_contact in chat_opened if user_name = name of chat_contact then tell chat_opened to become active exit repeat end if end repeat end repeat activate end tell end alfred_script

set query to "{query}" as text set res to "<?xml version='1.0'?><items>"
on pluralize(cnt, str1, str2) set subject to str2 if cnt = 1 then set subject to str1 set message to (cnt as text) & " " & subject return message end pluralize
tell application "System Events" to set is_adium_running to (name of processes) contains "Adium" if is_adium_running then set no_users_found to true set no_users_found_msg to "There is no users found"
tell application "Adium" set users_list to {} set results_count to 0
set unread_messages to {{name of first contact, unread message count}} of (every chat whose unread message count is not 0) log unread_messages
if length of query < 3 then set no_users_found_msg to "There is no active chats. Start typing to find users."
if length of query = 0 then repeat with user in every contact of every chat of every chat window set results_count to results_count + 1 if results_count > 10 then exit repeat set users_list to users_list & {{name of user, display name of user, name of account of user, status type of user}} end repeat else repeat with user in (every contact of every chat of every chat window whose (name contains query or display name contains query)) set results_count to results_count + 1 if results_count > 10 then exit repeat set users_list to users_list & {{name of user, display name of user, name of account of user, status type of user}} end repeat end if else repeat with user in (every contact whose (name contains query or display name contains query)) set results_count to results_count + 1 if results_count > 10 then exit repeat set users_list to users_list & {{name of user, display name of user, name of account of user, status type of user}} end repeat end if
repeat with user in users_list set no_users_found to false
set user_name to item 1 of user as text set user_nickname to item 2 of user as text set user_service to item 3 of user as text set user_status to item 4 of user as text
set unread_messages_count to "" repeat with unread in unread_messages if item 1 of unread contains user_name then set unread_count to item 2 of unread as number if unread_count is greater than 0 then set unread_messages_count to " (" & my pluralize(unread_count, "message", "messages") & ")" end if end if end repeat
set res to res & " <item uid=\"" & user_service & "##" & user_name & "\" arg=\"" & user_service & "##" & user_name & "\" valid=\"yes\"> <title>" & user_nickname & unread_messages_count & "</title> <subtitle>" & user_name & " (" & user_service & ")</subtitle>" if unread_messages_count is not "" then set res to res & "<icon>status_unread.png</icon>" else if user_status = "offline" then set res to res & "<icon>status_offline.png</icon>" else if user_status = "away" then set res to res & "<icon>status_away.png</icon>" else if user_status = "invisible" then set res to res & "<icon>status_invisible.png</icon>" else set res to res & "<icon>status_available.png</icon>" end if set res to res & "</item>" end repeat end tell
if no_users_found then set res to res & " <item uid=\"empty\" arg=\"empty\" valid=\"no\"><title>" & no_users_found_msg & "</title></item>" end if else set res to res & " <item uid=\"empty\" arg=\"empty\" valid=\"no\"><title>Adium is not running.</title></item>" end if
set res to res & " </items>" res
